title: eSports Predictive Analysis
description: Predicting the outcomes within a game of League of Legends using predictive modeling techniques. The project aims to provide insights into the factors that influence the outcome of a game, helping players and teams make informed decisions.

title: Interactive Calculator (IN PROGRESS)
description: Check out this interactive calculator that I built using React! It features a sleek design and allows users to perform basic arithmetic operations with ease.

title: NBA Injuries and Rest Days Analysis
description: An analysis of how teams in the NBA are affected by injuries and varying amounts of rest. The project utilizes data visualization techniques to present the findings in an engaging and informative manner.

title: Environmental Challenge Project
description: Examined a multitude of different solutions to reduce water usage at the Sea-Tac Airport in a cost-effective and environmentally friendly way, achieving 3rd place overall in the competition.
